subject: Super Bowl
Football
Doping (Sports)
Power Outages and Blackouts
lead_paragraph: It seemed fitting that this year’s Super Bowl included its share of weirdness, including a power failure during the game and a story line about the restorative powers of deer antler velvet extract.
snippet: It seemed fitting that this year’s Super Bowl included its share of weirdness, including a power failure during the game and a story line about the restorative powers of deer antler velvet extract.
